verses.arabic: بِّسْمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِيمِ وَٱلتِّينِ وَٱلزَّيْتُونِ
verses.english: By the fig and the olive
verses.hausa: Inã rantsuwa da Attinu da Azzaitũn.

verses.arabic: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا ٱلْإِنسَـٰنَ فِىٓ أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.english: We have certainly created man in the best of stature;
verses.hausa: Lalle ne, Mun halitta mutum a cikin mafi kyawon tsayuwa.

verses.english: Then We return him to the lowest of the low,
verses.hausa: Sa'an nan, Muka mayar da shi mafi ƙasƙantar masu rauni

verses.arabic: إِلَّا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُوا۟ وَعَمِلُوا۟ ٱلصَّـٰلِحَـٰتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.english: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds, for they will have a reward uninterrupted.
verses.hausa: Face waɗanda suka yi imani, kuma suka aikata ayyukan ƙwarai, saboda haka suna da sakamako wanda bã ya yankewa.

verses.english: So what yet causes you to deny the Recompense?
verses.hausa: To, bãyan haka mẽ ya sanya ka ka ƙaryata sakamako (wanda za a yi a bãyan Tãshin ¡iyãma)?

verses.english: Is not Allah the most just of judges?
verses.hausa: Ashe Allah bã Shi ne Mafi mãsu hukunci kyãwon hukunci ba?
